update brand_setting set sms_sign = #{smsSign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appraise_min_money = #{appraiseMinMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, customer_register_title = #{customerRegisterTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_welcome_img = #{wechatWelcomeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_welcome_title = #{wechatWelcomeTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_welcome_url = #{wechatWelcomeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, member_card_url = #{memberCardUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_welcome_content = #{wechatWelcomeContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_home_name = #{wechatHomeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_tangshi_name = #{wechatTangshiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_my_name = #{wechatMyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wechat_waimai_name = #{wechatWaimaiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auto_confirm_time = #{bizUrl},switch_mode = #{switchMode}, is_allow_extra_price = #{isAllowExtraPrice}, ali_pay = #{aliPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},integral_pay = #{integralPay},pos_open_table = #{posOpenTable},open_pos_charge = #{openPosCharge}, into_shop_subscribe = #{intoShopSubscribe},allow_appraise_subscribe = #{allowAppraiseSubscribe}, qr_code_brand = #{qrCodeBrand},open_andriod_apk = #{openAndriodApk},open_order_remark = #{openOrderRemark}, call_tv_type = #{callTvType},open_shoplist = #{openShoplist},open_pos_reminder = #{openPosReminder}, open_https = #{openHttps},turntable = #{openManyCustomerOrder},receipt_switch = #{receiptSwitch},message_switch = #{messageSwitch},open_ticket=#{openTicket},open_rpay=#{openRpay}, open_product_coupon=#{openProductCoupon},product_coupon_push_url=#{productCouponPushUrl},open_small_program_push=#{openSmallProgramPush},openAudit=#{openAudit}}, open_auto_permission = #{openAutoPermission} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT bs.* ,b.id brand_id,b.brand_name , wcc.appid,wcc.appsecret,wcc.mchid,wcc.mchkey,wcc.pay_cert_path,wcc.wx_server_id, wcc.id as config_id,wcc.is_sub as config_is_sub from brand_setting bs LEFT JOIN brand b on bs.id = b.brand_setting_id left JOIN wechat_charge_config wcc on wcc.id = bs.wechat_charge_config_id where b.state=1 ORDER BY b.create_time DESC
SELECT s.id,b.id brandId,s.open_third_interface,s.appid FROM brand_setting s INNER JOIN brand b on b.brand_setting_id = s.id WHERE b.state=1 AND s.open_third_interface=1

SELECT bs.id, bs.print_type, bs.is_allow_extra_price, bs.ali_pay, bs.open_union_pay, bs.open_shanhui_pay, bs.open_money_pay, bs.integral_pay, bs.is_use_service_price, bs.is_meal_fee, bs.open_pos_charge, bs.open_pos_reminder, bs.open_order_remark, bs.turntable, bs.open_pos_discount, bs.receipt_switch,bs.open_audit,bs.open_auto_permission from brand_setting bs LEFT JOIN brand b on bs.id = b.brand_setting_id where b.id = #{brandId}
